00016 #ifndef xrubysupportH
00017 #define xrubysupportH

00019 #include "xnode.h"
00020 #include "xrubythread.h"
00021 #include "xlistnode.h"

00023 class XMeasure;
00024 
00025 //! Ruby scripting support, containing a thread running Ruby monitor program.
00026 //! The monitor program synchronize Ruby threads and XRubyThread objects.
00027 //! \sa XRubyThread
00028 class XRuby : public XAliasListNode<XRubyThread>
00029 {
00030     XNODE_OBJECT
00031 protected:
00032     XRuby(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XMeasure> &measure);
00033 public:
00034     virtual ~XRuby();
00035   
00036     void resume() {m_thread.resume();}
00037     void terminate() {m_thread.terminate();}
00038 
00039 protected:
00040     virtual void *execute(const atomic<bool> &);
00041 private:
00042    
00043     struct rnode_ptr
00044     {
00045         weak_ptr<XNode> ptr;
00046         XRuby *xruby;
00047     };
00048     //! Ruby Objects
00049     VALUE rbClassNode, rbClassValueNode, rbClassListNode;
00050     //! delete Wrapper struct
00051     static void rnode_free(void *);
00052     static shared_ptr<XRubyThread> findRubyThread(VALUE self, VALUE threadid);
00053     //! def. output write()
00054     static VALUE my_rbdefout(VALUE self, VALUE str, VALUE threadid);
00055     //! def. input gets(). Return nil if the buffer is empty.
00056     static VALUE my_rbdefin(VALUE self, VALUE threadid);
00057     //! 
00058     static VALUE is_main_terminated(VALUE self);
00059     //! XNode wrappers
00060     static int strOnNode(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node, VALUE value);
00061     static VALUE getValueOfNode(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node);
00062     static VALUE rnode_create(const shared_ptr<XNode> &, XRuby *);
00063     static VALUE rnode_name(VALUE);
00064     static VALUE rnode_touch(VALUE);
00065     static VALUE rnode_count(VALUE);
00066     static VALUE rnode_child(VALUE, VALUE);
00067     static VALUE rvaluenode_set(VALUE, VALUE);
00068     static VALUE rvaluenode_load(VALUE, VALUE);
00069     static VALUE rvaluenode_get(VALUE);
00070     static VALUE rvaluenode_to_str(VALUE);
00071     static VALUE rlistnode_create_child(VALUE, VALUE, VALUE);
00072     static VALUE rlistnode_release_child(VALUE, VALUE);
00073 
00074     struct tCreateChild
00075     {
00076         XString type;
00077         XString name;
00078         shared_ptr<XListNodeBase> lnode;
00079         XCondition cond;
00080         shared_ptr<XNode> child;
00081     };
00082     XTalker<shared_ptr<tCreateChild> > m_tlkCreateChild;
00083     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnCreateChild;
00084     void onCreateChild(const shared_ptr<tCreateChild> &x);
00085   
00086     const weak_ptr<XMeasure> m_measure;
00087     XThread<XRuby> m_thread;
00088   
00089 };
